metadata.title: Sushi SaaS
metadata.description: Launch-ready SaaS starter with modern tooling and clean design.
metadata.keywords: saas template, next.js starter, better auth

hero.title: Ship your SaaS faster
hero.subtitle: Open‑source Next.js 15 boilerplate with i18n, Better Auth, Stripe billing and more — production‑ready from day one.

items.title: Modern, open‑source stack
items.description: Next.js 15, TypeScript, Tailwind — a production‑ready boilerplate to launch faster.

items.title: Auth & RBAC (Better Auth)
items.description: Email + Google sign‑in, secure sessions, and role checks with Drizzle.

items.title: Global i18n
items.description: Localized routes and messages so you can serve multiple languages easily.

items.title: Stripe billing + Credits
items.description: Checkout, subscriptions, and a flexible credits ledger for usage‑based models.

items.title: Reservations module
items.description: Bookings with availability, deposits or full payment, confirmations, and calendar invites.

items.title: Affiliate referrals
items.description: Invite links, tracked signups, and configurable rewards to fuel growth.

items.title: Admin panel
items.description: Manage users, orders, credits, reservations, and affiliates with role‑based access.

items.title: Docs & MDX
items.description: Built‑in docs/blog using MDX + Fumadocs with solid SEO metadata.

items.name: DojoClip
items.description: Browser-based video editor for multilingual subtitle and video translation.

landing.footer: Crafted in Next.js 15 with Tailwind CSS and Better Auth.

textToVideo.title: Text to Video
textToVideo.intro: Spend credits to generate a short video from a text prompt. This demo uses a mock provider; swap your engine in src/services/ai/video.ts.
textToVideo.errorDetails: Ensure you are signed in and have enough credits.
textToVideo.notSignedInDesc: Please sign up or log in to create a task.
